participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, often engages others with questions.
participant_1.background: Alex has a background in marketing and enjoys meeting new people.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and a bit reserved, prefers to share insights rather than small talk.

content.text: I am not sure what you do for a living?
